dao.db

Class CompanyDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.db.CompanyDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompanyDAO

    public class CompanyDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CompanyDAO
    This class implements CompanyDAO interface for basic DML functions of Company table in database. The class using for all throwables within the CouponManagementSystem
    Version:
    1.00, 28/07/2016
    Author:
    Morris Elkanaev
